content: Through much of the last century, America’s faith in freedom and democracy was a rock in a raging sea. Now it is a seed upon the wind, taking root in many nations.
translations: ita:Per gran parte del secolo scorso, la fede dell'America nella libertà e nella democrazia era una roccia in un mare in tem
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
